[Version]

[HD 5120 kbit]
Cmd=-threads {threads} {offset} {realtime} -i "{infile}" -threads {threads} -f flv -vcodec libx264 -bufsize 1024k -b:v 4250k -bt 4500k {framerate} -map 0:0 -map 0:1 -vf "yadif, scale={scalex}:{scaley}" -preset {vpreset} -tune film -vprofile baseline -level 30 -acodec libmp3lame -ab 256k -ar 44100 -ac 2 -async 1 -y "{outfile}"

maxHeight=720
